name: Moss Island
description:
Explore along a stream of water, discover two forest ponds and watch the day go by as the sun rises and sets in a red glow. The ancient trees were swallowed by a new wave of growth, covering everything under a thick canopy of leaves.

This project is by no means perfect or complete. It is at this stage simply an environment showcase to walk around in and to enjoy the atmosphere.

Controls:

WASD: move around

Mouse: move camera

SPACE: jump

ESC: menu

Double tap SPACE to start gliding from a high point.

When jumping, press W to start climbing a nearby large tree.

Art+design+code: Iris Anstey

Sound: Paul Anstey
